text: The berimbau () is a single-string percussion instrument, a musical bow, from Brazil. Originally from Africa where it receives different names, the berimbau was eventually brought into the practice of the Afro-Brazilian martial art capoeira, the berimbau leads the capoeiristas movement in the rodaâ€”the faster the berimbau is playing the faster the capoeirista moves in the game. ==References== Category:Musical instruments Category:Brazilian culture
title: Berimbau
